338b2(mdo sde): brgyan/ skra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthing la lcang lor 'khyil ba yin pas/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am// de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang / 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis/
338b3(mdo sde): khyod kyi srog bcad na ma legs so// de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na/ kho bos 'das pa
338b4(mdo sde): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa bsrung bar mi 'gyur zhes zer nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag du 'dus shes 'di
338b5(mdo sde): la gnas nas su/ / bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yod mi nus// mi zad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi/ byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yi// gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs
338b6(mdo sde): shing / sems can 'di dag gang zag spu rnams dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang // reg bya spong ba de ni bstan pa srung // bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// dang ba'i
338b7(mdo sde): sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang / / gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i 'phreng ba yis// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas// gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jigs pa dang // bde gshegs
339a1(mdo sde): bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ / nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa// bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags// skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam
339a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos/ / 'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms skom// de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin// 'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas// khyed bde rang gi don gyis la// bdag nyid
339a3(mdo sde): rab tu bsrung bar gyis/ / khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas shing // 'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis// ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa// tshul khrims drang por bsrung bar gyis//
339a4(mdo sde): gis tshul khrims dri ma med// sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsrungs pa ni// de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba// bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas// de yis thams cad bslabs
339a5(mdo sde): pa yin/ / skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod// sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod pa yi// tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrung ba// de dag gis ni sems can ma
339a6(mdo sde): po yang / / sems can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs// chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis// bzod pa dag kyang rtag du bsrung gyis la// dgon par gnas shing
339a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang / / 'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par gyis// rnam pa kun tu rtsod pa ma byed pa// spyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod// bdag ni sems
339b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyang bsgrub pa'i phyir/ / grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya// blo gros che 'chung sems can dam pa'i mchog/ drung srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang // kha cig rkang /
339b2(mdo sde): pa la yang 'ju bar byed// snying rje bar yang ngu zhing mchi ma zag/ mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par// sgra 'jam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi// shing 'di rnams la
339b3(mdo sde): gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod/ / bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig/ sngon gyi stobs bcu 'dren pa de dag kyang // dbang po zhi zhing shin tu nges pa rnams// nags
339b4(mdo sde): tshal brag dang ri yi rtser gshegs nas/ / byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud// byang chub rgyu yang spyod pa dam pa spyod// de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de
339b5(mdo sde): dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod/ / brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig/ lus ni shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan// khyod kyi skra yang mthon ting kha
339b6(mdo sde): dog ste/ / gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba 'od byed pa// sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur// khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na// shin tu mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i
339b7(mdo sde): 'od/ rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir// phrag dog bskyed nas khyod kyis lus bshig 'gyur// de nas chos spu me tog zla mdzes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po
340a1(mdo sde): de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ / ji snyed sngon gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni// thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten rngon
340a2(mdo sde): mdzad de/ / srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs// spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de// de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de yi rjes bslabs byang chub sems
340a3(mdo sde): dpa' yang / / sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod// drang srong ma bas la kun gyis bskor byas te// rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas// mi zad snying
340a4(mdo sde): rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing / / nyam thag mi bde cho nges bdebs par byed// kha cig rab tu 'gyel cing brgyal nas su// sa la ltung ba sa la bcad 'gyed bzhin// 'on kyang drang
340a5(mdo sde): slong sems can don 'dod pa/ / bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir ma log/ drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas// ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin/
340a6(mdo sde): ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na// de la yon tan nyes par bye ba med// 'jig rten 'dir ni nags khrod bdag gnas pas// sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes/
340a7(mdo sde): ni sems can bslabs pa'i don gyi phyir// grong khyer po brang mchog du song bar gyur/ de nas chos slab me tog bla mdzes/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang
340b1(mdo sde): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ de snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thu na med
340b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ / da dung rgyal po'i pho brang der ma phyin nas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang /
340b3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/ shing p+lag sha dang / sa la'i drung du 'dug go/ de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan du zhugs
340b4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyis chos la phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang / da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas bcad pa bcad
340b5(mdo sde): nas rgyal ba'i 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i
340b6(mdo sde): nub mo 'das nas/ de'i snga dro gnyis pa la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu gsum sangs rgyas kyi chos lus phyir mi ldog par bkod de/
340b7(mdo sde): da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas gnyis pa bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa
341a1(mdo sde): der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro gsum pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas//
341a2(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas gsum pa bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal
341a3(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das
341a4(mdo sde): nas de snga dro bzhi pa la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
341a5(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas bzhi pa bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
341a6(mdo sde): sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro lnga pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas/
341a7(mdo sde): bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do// grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag
341b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de nyi ma lnga zas bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste
341b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
341b3(mdo sde): rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de nyi ma drug zas bcad pa
341b4(mdo sde): bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so//
341b5(mdo sde): de'i nub mo 'das nas/ de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing
341b6(mdo sde): rta la ngos ni dngul/ mnga' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor lo ni bai DUR+Ya/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dAn bsgreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi rgyan pa
341b7(mdo sde): shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de/ bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus gtags shing 'dren ste/ de dag byad bzhin bzang
342a1(mdo sde): zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams
342a2(mdo sde): la ni ma yin no/ / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mtho dman du 'gro'o// bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mtho
342a3(mdo sde): dman du 'gro'o/ / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mtho dman du 'gro'o// rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog
342a4(mdo sde): thag tu 'gro sde/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad
342a5(mdo sde): kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang / gdu bu rnams
342a6(mdo sde): bkrol te/ lham rnams bzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong dag la bde logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal
342a7(mdo sde): zhing 'khod do/ / de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas/ khyogs de dag las babs nas/ nor bu dang / gdu bu dag bkrol te/ lham rnams
342b1(mdo sde): bzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
342b2(mdo sde): dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe// nyi ma lta bur thams cad du// 'di dag rab tu snang bar bgyis// skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing // gti mug
342b3(mdo sde): dag kyang sel bar gyur/ / de tshe zhe sdang khro ba dang // phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur// rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yin// zham ring sras la sogs pa yang // su yang rgyal
342b4(mdo sde): po mi lta ste/ / su yang zham ring mi bgyid do// ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni// skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin// rgyal po'i bu yis mdun bdar bas// dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur//
342b5(mdo sde): ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag/ mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang // sa la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar// de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur// mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni//
342b6(mdo sde): grong khyer 'jig pa bdag po mig stong ldan// ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra//
342b7(mdo sde): 'phrul lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin// 'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du// dge slong byon pa 'di yang rab tu mdzes// nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis// 'od
343a1(mdo sde): stong ldan mun nags rab tu sel/ / phyogs rnams kun tu snang ba bgyid pa lhur// de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur// bskal pa mthu' yas rgya che
343a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin/ / tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis// bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms// de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes// 'angag
343a3(mdo sde): pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/ / bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen// nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab skyed// de phyir dge slong 'jig rten
343a4(mdo sde): kun tu gda'/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste// dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad// ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yis//
343a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po dbang bsnyes rnams kyi sras de lags// dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig/ gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan// gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs
343a6(mdo sde): sgra shin tu snyan par gdab/ / rgyal po gzi brjid shin tu lham me snang mi bgyid// chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing // sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten
343a7(mdo sde): kun du rgyu/ / de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te// bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi// de dag thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas/
343b1(mdo sde): tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed// gser gyi 'phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang // rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor// ji ltar 'khor los
343b2(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal po dag/ stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta// sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog/ gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun tu 'gro// rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram
343b3(mdo sde): zo dang / / khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mi// de dag gcig la lhag par sdug pa med// thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par skyed// de bzhin dge slong nges pa 'di yang ni//
343b4(mdo sde): gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs// byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang // yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed// mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang //
343b5(mdo sde): ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe// gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin// dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas nges
343b6(mdo sde): pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gi ni bsngags pa bskal pa rgyas// zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni// yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yod
343b7(mdo sde): med de/ / 'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang // bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro// des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor// ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu
344a1(mdo sde): bstan/ / zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams pashad pa mdzad// de ni gang na 'ang snang bur 'gyur bu me// dge sbyong dang ni zlum ze lnga dang klu// mA min+d+ra bdudan/
344a2(mdo sde): tshangs par bcas la sogs// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis// rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yod mi nus// gong gis thugs sras bdi 'i dra mnga' ba yi//
344a3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'// gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed//
344a4(mdo sde): gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed// gtsug gi nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag/ ring thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas// dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni// dga' nas byang chub phyir/
344a5(mdo sde): yang rab tu zhugs// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs kyang log go snyam mo//
344a6(mdo sde): skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de gal ba de logs su thal
344a7(mdo sde): mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ / dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang / de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/
344b1(mdo sde): de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin tu spangs par gyur to// dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin du khros so// dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul
344b2(mdo sde): song ba dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis mig gis brda byas so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ de dge/

344b6(mdo sde): lam na/ rgyal po dpa' bos byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go// rgyal po dpa' bos byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde
344b7(mdo sde): ba skyes nas/ de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed pa dis dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar byed snyam mo// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bos byin gang na 'dug
345a1(mdo sde): pa der 'ongs pa dang / dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na// dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar byed nus sam/
345a2(mdo sde): dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lha shin du rngo thog go// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la dbab
345a3(mdo sde): par shes na/ mtshan rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig/ rna ba dang sna yang chod cig/ 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bstas kyis//
345a4(mdo sde): de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang rkam pas phyung shig ces byas so// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis/ de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do//
345a5(mdo sde): rna ba dang sna yang bcad do// mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo // de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang / rna ba dang / rkang lag bcad pa las/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung / 'o ma'i//
345a6(mdo sde): rgyun du ma yang byung ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas/ slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo// bcad cing btubs pa'i 'phro nas/ dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / 'khor
345a7(mdo sde): lo la sogs pa nang nas byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun du snang ngo // de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des
345b1(mdo sde): dge slong de laman bcad gdubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste/ smre sngags bton nas/ phyir/

346a2(mdo sde): yid mi bde ste/ 'gyod par gyur pas/ de'i tshe cho nges cher btab nas/ tshig 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang // nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig
346a3(mdo sde): spangs/ / bdag nyid mtshon thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar bya// bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan// dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos

346a5(mdo sde): dang / / shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas song // rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor// dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni// 'dir byon dge slong de nas
346a6(mdo sde): mthong nas su/ / bud med tshogs rnams rab tu dga' gyur cing // mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor// thams cad sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshogs bcad dbyangs
346a7(mdo sde): kyis dge slong de la bstod/ / rgyal po yi ni klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur// de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas ni// rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs/
346b1(mdo sde): su bskor bar gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba// dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na// bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te// dge slong rgyal po'i pho
346b2(mdo sde): brang 'jug pa'i tshe/ / bud med tshogs chen dga' ba lta mthong nas// rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba skyed// phyogs pani kun du snang bar bgyis pa ni// za ba sgra gcan zin
346b3(mdo sde): thar mdzes pa bzhin/ / dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas// bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin// bdag gis der ni gtums pa'i tshig smras te// bu stong
346b4(mdo sde): dag la de nyid khyed song la/ / dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis// 'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa// gzhon nu thams cad mnyes zhing tshul ldan te// bdag la phan sems dge
346b5(mdo sde): slong de la 'dud/ / rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung // de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur// dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa// byams ldan pa bzhin
346b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa mthong nas ni/ / shin tu gdum pa'i sems kyis gsod du btang // phyi dus bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg/ dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas// ma ruH
346b7(mdo sde): las bgyi mi la sdug bsngal bskyed/ / bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar de bgyis te// me tog 'phreng brgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gdums// nags mchog kun tu bzang po dga' ba na//
347a1(mdo sde): byA yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyus// de na dge sbyong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba// bu gcig pa ni ma dang bral ba bzhin// dge slong bzhengs la nags su
347a2(mdo sde): gnas par mdzod/ / mi yi don kyang shin tu rgya cher bgyis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe// dge slong shin tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol// lag pa g.yas pas me
347a3(mdo sde): tog rgyal mtshan thogs/ / g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdug mdzes pa gzhan// lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs// dge slong bzhengs las chos mchog
347a4(mdo sde): bshad pa mdzod/ / rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon yang // dge slong rab tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe// khyod kyi srog
347a5(mdo sde): gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs/ / ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa// srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas//
347a6(mdo sde): g.yang sa chen por mchongs te sar lhung ltar// de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa// byad bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'gyel par gyur// me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa//
347a7(mdo sde): bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur blags// me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba// chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur ba yang // dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir
347b1(mdo sde): gyur te/ / mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde// me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te// 'phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra//
347b2(mdo sde): 'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad// bdag gis dngos sdig shin du mi bzad bgyis// mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi// 'dir yang dge slong dum bur blags pa
347b3(mdo sde): yis/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring // bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na// bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur// blon po dang ni zham ring
347b4(mdo sde): bkram pa yang / / de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang // phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi// ded dpon stobs bcu nyon
347b5(mdo sde): mongs med pa rnams/ / rdo rje sdug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su mchi// der ni dge slong dum bur byas mthong nas// lha rnams rab tu snying rje cho nges bde bas// de dag der song dge 'dun go bar
347b6(mdo sde): byas/ / me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de// mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs
347b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa de/ / me tog rma mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin// tshul khrims mi g.yo bskyod med gang srung zhing // 'jig rten kun
348a1(mdo sde): du mtshungs med bzod sgoms pa/ / me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing // zhum med sems kyis
348a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/ / nyon mongs pajoms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing // de bzhin
348a3(mdo sde): srog la ma chags gyur nas ni/ / kun tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nas su// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lha'i cho de'i snying rje thos nas ni// dge slong de kun/
348a4(mdo sde): shin tu sdug bsngal nas// me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la// lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags// des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas// dge slong dum bu dum bur
348a5(mdo sde): byas mthong ste/ / nyam thag skad kyis mi bzang cho nges 'debs// de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smras// tshul khrims skyon med shin tu
348a6(mdo sde): babasdams pa yi/ / dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas// 'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam yas dran// 'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin// 'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par
348a7(mdo sde): shes/ 'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston// 'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs// 'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin// 'di ni nges shing dbang po rab du ni//
348b1(mdo sde): 'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin// 'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags// 'di ni sangs rgyas rab byung ye shes kyis// khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mo byas/
348b2(mdo sde): dag cing rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta// byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che// 'dod pa ngan cing brtsog la sdug bsngal bskyed// mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste// 'dod pa
348b3(mdo sde): bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur/ / mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na// long par 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod// 'dod pa
348b4(mdo sde): bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod/ / de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spangs// rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na// sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas// mi
348b5(mdo sde): bzang sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas/ / sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro// 'di 'dra'i dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed de// sdig pa'i las rnams rtag
348b6(mdo sde): tu byed par 'gyur/ / de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spangs par bya// lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni// gzug
348b7(mdo sde): dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang / / reg bya chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong // sbyin pa bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med// bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de
349a1(mdo sde): bzhin te/ / bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song // sems can dag gris don kyang rab tu byed// 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang //
349a2(mdo sde): byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu blta// de phyir mig ni mun nag gtibs gyur kyang // byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur// rta dang ba glang yang thog khri rnams dang // khyogs dang sngas
349a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang ni de bzhin de/ / glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang // grong dang yul 'khor dga' bas gtong bar byed// grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yong gtong zhing // gser dang dngul
349a4(mdo sde): dang shel dang byi ru dang / / de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang // rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs// me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
349a5(mdo sde): lha'i ba dan dang / / rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs thogs nas ni// dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed// srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang // srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga'
349a6(mdo sde): mi byed/ / de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing // phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams
349a7(mdo sde): rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams/ / gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te// khams gsum dag la snga nas chags pa med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa
349b1(mdo sde): bdag tu 'du shes sems can 'du shes med/ / srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med// tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang
349b2(mdo sde): gnas pa/ / dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med// bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med// grangs su 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med// byang chub
349b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ / yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med// bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med// grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med//
349b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'a dab 'du shes med// 'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med// zhe sdang 'du shes sdang
349b5(mdo sde): bral 'du shes med/ / gti mug 'du shes mongs bral 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med// ma rig
349b6(mdo sde): ma rig ma yin 'du shes med/ / lha dang lta ba ma yin du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te// byang chub
349b7(mdo sde): yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med/ / khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong // 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med// gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo
350a1(mdo sde): med 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed// blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed// su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni// de la
350a2(mdo sde): nam yang nem nur mi byed pa/ / 'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/ bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes// 'dza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye// de yang nyon
350a3(mdo sde): mongs pa ni chen po yin/ / zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur// dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung // 'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spangs byas te// blo gros ldan pa
350a4(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub zhugs/ / de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni// 'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab
350a5(mdo sde): gnas shing / / tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs// ral pa med cing ma 'dren skyon yang med// nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag/ 'phags shing 'dres pa dag tu
350a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ / mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas// blo gros 'chang pa byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dpa' bos byin/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
350a7(mdo sde): las chos smra ba me tog bla mdzes kyi yon tan gyi bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la
350b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ / nags khrod stug po kun du bzang po ni// sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bu mdzes// dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan//
350b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin// gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan// mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong
350b3(mdo sde): grag/ grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed// nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshul bzhin te// gzugs bzang gzugs pa bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs// me tog rnam pa sna
350b4(mdo sde): / tshogs tha dad bkram// ut+pal pad+mos pargyun cing chu yang 'bab// 'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba// drang srong rtag tu gnas par mthun pa dag/ bor nas sems
350b5(mdo sde): can don dang phan bzhed pas/ / sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon// de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di// me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te// byon nas drag pa
350b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa bdag gis dkrongs/ / 'di dkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang // dpa' bo sems can phan phyir
350b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten spyod/ / de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o// gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa ni// gang gzhan
351a1(mdo sde): nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste/ / zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med 'chi ba skyobs/ de nas yang
351a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par
351a3(mdo sde): bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu rul
351a4(mdo sde): nga'i lus 'di dang / / srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de// rmi lam thum 'dra ba la// sems can gang dag chags pa ni// shin tu ma rlung las byas nas// gti mug dbang song de dag ni/
351a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba mi zad par// mi mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song // dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni// chu yi ru bur 'dra srog la// mi gang chags par mi byed pa// de dag/
351a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro// de nas yang bcom ldan pa das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting
351a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya ste/ mgo dang gos
351b1(mdo sde): la meb bar ba lta bus brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dper na dben pa na bde bar gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang / nags khrod
351b2(mdo sde): spang te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de
351b3(mdo sde): dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur
351b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher
351b5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ / ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na// de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes
351b6(mdo sde): bya/ / bskyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur// shing rtar zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong // kun nus mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go/
351b7(mdo sde): bgos pa// phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed// me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste// snying rje gnas pa rab phan snying brtse ba// dpal dang gzi brjid dag
352a1(mdo sde): gris mdzes pa ni/ / sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs// nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas// de ya nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes//
352a2(mdo sde): 'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas ni// 'di ni bdag gi srid las skyod snyam ste// dra yi bu rnams sbyong du tshang ba yang // shing rtar zhugs shing zham ring mthon dman
352a3(mdo sde): 'gro/ cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyi sa brgyan// sum cu dbang phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin// de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag/ nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug/
352a4(mdo sde): mgo brgyan dang ni lhab lhub brgyan gyis spud// de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta 'dren// nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang // gzugs mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag
352a5(mdo sde): shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/ / ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba// mthong nas de dag phar yang 'du shes bskyed// byang chub dam pa mchog tu
352a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed te/ / de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud// yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams de la gtor// de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mi
352a7(mdo sde): bzad do/ / dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad byas// mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis// gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas// shin du sdug bsngal
352b1(mdo sde): yid kyang mi dgar gyur/ / yab cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung // dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// bdag cag lus
352b2(mdo sde): dang yan lag bcad btubs kyang / / dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi bgyid de// 'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so// rgyal po de tshe bu yi tshig thos nas/ khros te
352b3(mdo sde): gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras/ / nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi// dge slong 'di ni myur du gsod de phul// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs// shin tu
352b4(mdo sde): gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med/ / 'bru mar ngar btags ral gri thogs nas su// de yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas// de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las// khrag
352b5(mdo sde): kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste/ / bcad pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u 'khor lo dag/ mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang du yod// shin tu ma rungs las ni byas nas su// bskyed
352b6(mdo sde): mos tshal du de yi mod la byung / / dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni// dge slong de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to// rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing 'gyogs par ni// de nas
352b7(mdo sde): bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song / / gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa// sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs nas phyin// lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la// tshe nges bdengs/
353a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dag de thos te// rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis// shrI phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro// rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas// shin du
353a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur/ / bdag gis me tog zla mdzes dkrongs pa ni// bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan//
353a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang // dbang po bsrung shing nges pa zhi ba'i yid// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin
353a4(mdo sde): cing / / zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod// 'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal
353a5(mdo sde): po gang / / sems can na ba rtag tu gso byed cing // bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi// dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir dkrongs// zhi cing zab la zhi ba lta dka' yi//
353a6(mdo sde): chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing // byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod padzin cing //
353a7(mdo sde): bajig rten mdongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste// gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa// de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir dkrongs// nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes
353b1(mdo sde): can/ zhi ba bzhi rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa// 'dod pas mdongs pa dag gis deng dkrongs te// des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar lhung // sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang
353b2(mdo sde): bzhin ma byon dang / / mi yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams// de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi//
353b3(mdo sde): / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa// // de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de//
353b4(mdo sde): shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'drug pa mthong nas// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste// 'gyod cing mos par gyur nas/ de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab bo// chos smra
353b5(mdo sde): ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa pa de dag smras so// kun tu bzang po pa phags pa'i dge 'dun
353b6(mdo sde): gyis khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis/ / khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re// rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud// khyod kyi dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung //
353b7(mdo sde): mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon// khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi// don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol// lha rdzas mig gu sna tshogs brgyan pa yis// gzugs bzang
354a1(mdo sde): gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs/ / grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs// lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog/ kun
354a2(mdo sde): tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag zhugs pa/ / nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni// bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa// des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la bsrungs// khyod kyis
354a3(mdo sde): tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi/ / sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig/ kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha// bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi// gcig pu seng
354a4(mdo sde): ge ri dgas rgyal po ltar/ / dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas// sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir// rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na// 'dod chags zil
354a5(mdo sde): non shin tu 'jungs pa yis/ / bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad// 'dir ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang // khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par// bdag ni 'jigs
354a6(mdo sde): skrag khyod la cig gsol pa/ / bde bar gsol bar gcig ni mdzad par 'os// me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la// nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol// sems
354a7(mdo sde): can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ / chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol// di ring bdag la sna cig snang bar mdzod// nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol// chos smra
354b1(mdo sde): mchog ni bdag gis dkrongs bgyis te/ / sdig pa ma legs bdag gis der bgyis pas// 'di nas 'chi 'bos mi bzang dmyal bar skye// bdag la de yi sbubs su 'gyur ba mad// nyon
354b2(mdo sde): mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung / / rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung // thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs// 'dod
354b3(mdo sde): chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnams dag chos/ / snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa// me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir dkros/
354b4(mdo sde): kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyugs brtul zhugs bzang // kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan// kye ma g.yo med dpal sdug spros pa mi mnga' ba// bdag cag bor nas
354b5(mdo sde): khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad/ / 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na// 'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung // 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo
354b6(mdo sde): mtshar gyur/ / ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol// kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can// kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo chung // kye mchos
354b7(mdo sde): rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog/ lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs rjer mdzad du gsol// kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig/ kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon
355a1(mdo sde): cig/ kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcus mngon 'phags pa// tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud// kye ma dpa' bo nur smyon bdag la gsungs// khyod
355a2(mdo sde): yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / / brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis// byams pa chen po bzhengs las gsungs phyung cig/ kye ma shin tu mchod pos lha yi lha// chos
355a3(mdo sde): sma cang mi gsungs par ci smad bzhugs/ / mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud// bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig/ lha khyod lus ni bcad par mi nus te//
355a4(mdo sde): lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang // khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis// mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cing // lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la mang/
355a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma ma mdzes so// sgyu ma thams cad spong la bzhengs su gsol// rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig/ kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur/
355a6(mdo sde): kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur// kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur// bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni bcad du gsol// ngan song skyes pa rnams kyis rten dang /
355a7(mdo sde): dpung // srog chags mnar med chen por lhung ba yi// skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig/ bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol// mgon po khyod ni dgung
355b1(mdo sde): bdun bshos ma gsol/ / re shig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ bdag gi bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir// sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod//
355b2(mdo sde): kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab// kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems// kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig/ kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog
355b3(mdo sde): dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur/ / kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid// sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la// dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang 'byung ba mdzod//
355b4(mdo sde): kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sbron gyur pa// kye mtshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud// kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni// dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig/ kye kye
355b5(mdo sde): chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che/ / a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'// shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa// kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol// tshig gi lam
355b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i gzungs de yang / / kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol// kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir// me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol// kye kye rgyal sras bdag la
355b7(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba/ / 'gro ba'i dbugs 'byin mdzad pa bla na med// kye kye mtshon dang dbyugs pas btab pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des// kye kye me tog
356a1(mdo sde): zla mdzes thugs brtse can/ / rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol// kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang // mthong bar dga' ba'i gzungs rnams/
356a2(mdo sde): bshad du gsol// kye kye 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/ kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la// brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje
356a3(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan/ / kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol// dpa' po sems can dag gi don mdzad pa// kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang // khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i/
356a4(mdo sde): grong du khod// kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che// mkhas pa bslab pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug/ kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing // chos kyi shing gi myu gu
356a5(mdo sde): mngon par dga'/ / kye kye chos gos ngur smig kha bsgyur 'chang // rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzad// kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs bzang // rab sbyin dka' thub
356a6(mdo sde): bzang po khyod bzhengs shig/ kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan// kye kye dul ba rab dul rjes su bzhud// zhi ba dbang po rab
356a7(mdo sde): zhi khong nas des/ / kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa// chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod// kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag/ sad par bgyis nas theg pa
356b1(mdo sde): mchog la khod/ / kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la// brtson 'grus tha gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te// kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni// rab tu ltung zhing sred par dad pa
356b2(mdo sde): rnams/ / kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog/ gnyan pa gdongs padzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol// kye kye shin tu sra ba'i grur yang ni// zhugs nas bdag dang de
356b3(mdo sde): dag bsgral bar mdzod/ / kyo kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la// shin du spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/ kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos
356b4(mdo sde): kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa/ / kye kye 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// btab pa'i sems can na ba rnams gzigs nas// kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la// chos kyi sman rnams
356b5(mdo sde): shin tu stsal bar mdzod/ / kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin// kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing // thugs
356b6(mdo sde): rje sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/ / kye kye na par gyur pa'i sems can khams// 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa'i rnams// des ni sems can thams cad bde ba
356b7(mdo sde): dang / nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya cher bslabs// chos kyi rnga dag shin du brdung bar mdzod// kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tsom gyi/
357a1(mdo sde): 'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mchos chod// kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa// rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang // 'khor gyi nang du gdun
357a2(mdo sde): la rab zhugs la/ / mi mchog mkhas pa brjod pas mdzad du gsol// me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye// dpe byas bzang po brgyad cu tshangs pa kye// dpe byad bzang po
357a3(mdo sde): brgyad cus lus brgyan kye/ / srid pa'i mtsho rgal spos med tshur skyon kye// srid pa'i btson rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye// ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye// me tog
357a4(mdo sde): zla ba thugs rje chen po kye/ / byams dang snying rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye// me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar// tshur gshegs
357a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba mdzod/ / bzhengs lanags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye// me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog/ mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams
357a6(mdo sde): shing phan/ / gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye// ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
357a7(mdo sde): sems can mnyam yid kye/ / me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye// bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod// lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye// lha yi mig ma khas/
357b1(mdo sde): ye shes rtogs pa kye// bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig zugs rje can// grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson ste// 'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kyi// me tog zla ba shAn+da
357b2(mdo sde): du sbyin dgyes kye/ / bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod// khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig/ grong 'di skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang // khyod mthong thams cad shi
357b3(mdo sde): bzhin sa la 'gyel/ / snying rkams 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid// thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs// gang gis slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang // ye shes
357b4(mdo sde): shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang / / khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs// de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes// lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
357b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci// snyim pa me tog bdugs pas bkang nas ni// thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod// drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te//
357b6(mdo sde): skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin// yid kyi nang du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu// de phyir 'dod pa'i spro ba spang bar bya// dge slong bdag gis bsad pa'i sdig gi las// shin tu
357b7(mdo sde): ma legs mi bde byas pas na/ / bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med 'gro// bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med// bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang tshangs spyod gzhol// spos
358a1(mdo sde): dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni/ / mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya// shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya// bu dang bu mo bud med khyim
358a2(mdo sde): bdag dang / / blon po dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang // grong ba dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams// de dag thams cad la ni ngas sgo ba// a ga ru dang tsan dan shugs pa dang /
358a3(mdo sde): shin tu zhim pa'i spo sa mchog ci yod pas// myur du sgron gyi nang du khyogs chos la// dge slong 'di ni bsregs pa'i cho ga gyis// grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/
358a4(mdo sde): spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te// spos rab bzang po yid du bongs las byas// der ni dge slong de yang bcug nas su// a ga ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka/
358a5(mdo sde): rgyu spos spri ka de bzhin pa tA la// me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs// de yi rus pa sgrom ni byas par gyur// dge slong dag
358a6(mdo sde): gis de yang der bsregs te/ / rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nas su// 'di la ngas ni mchod pa byas zhes zer// me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ gdugs dang ba dAn rgyal mtshan
358a7(mdo sde): thogs nas su/ / rgyal pos der ni sil snyan stong dag dang // bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud// nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du// dge slong de yi mchod rten de
358b1(mdo sde): drung du/ / sdig pa sngan chad cung zad ci byas pa// de tshe dus gsum du yang shin du 'chags// lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar// nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags te/
358b2(mdo sde): phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral srung // rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma med// lo sbyong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcur yang // gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te// de ni//
358b3(mdo sde): de tshe bdag gi lus shig nas// mnar med mi bzad par ni der lhung gyur// 'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur//
358b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga// de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas// lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar// de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag
358b5(mdo sde): khrig drug cu gnyis/ / sngon chad nga yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang // shin tu mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs// mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang
358b6(mdo sde): lag kyang / / bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur// bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig du// mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du'ang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag
358b7(mdo sde): gis rab ces shing / / sdug bsngal tshol ba yun ring myong bar gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams byas pa 'khor ba na// yun ring shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de phyir byang chub
359a1(mdo sde): zhi ba su 'dod pa/ / srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o// rgyal po'i mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang // snga ma'i nyes byas rnams las de mthar// mi
359a2(mdo sde): zad gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas/ / de shi dmyal ba mi bzad mnar med song // nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad// bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad//
359a3(mdo sde): spyod pa spyod tshe mtshon cha dbyig thogs nas// 'debs byed nan gyis nga yis mig kyang phyung // byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang // bu dang chung ma mig dang rang gi sha/ rkang lag
359a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang / / sngon gyi sdig pa'i las ni zad ma gyur// kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod// sangs rgyas dpa' sdug dpag tu med pa mthong/
359a5(mdo sde): byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni spyod pa na// de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag sngon myong gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing // byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul pa//
359a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas// de dag nam yang ngan song sar mi 'gro// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa// chos rje sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa// tshul
359a7(mdo sde): khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs/ / gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang bstan par gyis// nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpa' byin yin// nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba// me tog bla
359b1(mdo sde): mdzes pad+ma bla ma yin/ / dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal bar gyur// 'jig rten gsum pa 'gro ba'i gnyen cig pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur// skye dgu da
359b2(mdo sde): gi don chen mdzad nas ni/ / mar me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das// bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang // khyim bdag dang ni blon po stobs chen dang // tshong dpon de bzhin
359b3(mdo sde): grong pa'i mkhar gyi rgyal/ / thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur// me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste sumacu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/
359b4(mdo sde): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par
359b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan
359b6(mdo sde): par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms pas mang
359b7(mdo sde): du bsgom par bya/ / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
360a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas shing // bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/
360a2(mdo sde): mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas// bzod pa de thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// de phyir gnod sems med cing kun mthun gyis// thams cad rtag tu yid du 'ong bar bgyis// /
360a3(mdo sde): dpag sdug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni// byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni// dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong
360a4(mdo sde): nas/ mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bsten par bya// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur// gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med// rin chen sna bdun nor bus gang
360a5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ / de bzhin zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// nor bu rin po che yis gang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin la mos pa yis// nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin//
360a6(mdo sde): de bzhin bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin pa byin pa bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di// thos nas bde gshegs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa//
360a7(mdo sde): bsod nams phung po des ni gang bzung ba// sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod// mi gang rjes su 'thun la dad pa dag/ ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bsod nams phung
360b1(mdo sde): po dpe med mchog 'di yin/ / ye shes mdzod de dpag med 'byung gnas so// ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di bzung na// byang chub sems dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur// rgya mtsho
360b2(mdo sde): chen po bzhin du thos pa'i gter/ / de la bsod nams tshad yod yong mi 'gyur// chos kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// shin tu rgyas byas byang chub sems dpa'
360b3(mdo sde): brjod/ / ting 'dzin 'di ni su dag ston byed pa// de ni nam yang byang chub the tsom med// bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing // gang la tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
360b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren// rang byung thugs rje chen po ma gtogs par// de yi 'og tu sems can su dag kyang // stong chen 'di na bsod nams phung po dang /
360b5(mdo sde): mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes kyis// mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yong med do// ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin pa dang // klog cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang /
360b6(mdo sde): mtshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gtogs// de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhing klags pa yis// bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags
360b7(mdo sde): pa yang / / gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na// 'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi 'gyur// gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang // 'das dang byung ba'i de bzhin
361a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis// ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing bklags par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di
361a2(mdo sde): yin te/ / gzhon nu nga yi tshig la dad par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa brdzun gyi tshig mi gsung // 'di 'dra'i sems can rdzun du smra ba med// sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bsam
361a3(mdo sde): yas su/ / byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di rab spyod cing // ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su tshol ba'i phyir// ngas ni bdag tu lta ba 'dir sbyangs so// de phyir chos kyi mdzod 'di mnyan par gyis//
361a4(mdo sde): 'di las mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig 'byung // 'di ni bsod nams phung po mtha' yas yang // 'dis ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob// mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang ston pa//
361a5(mdo sde): 'di ni mdo sde kun gyi dam pa'i mdo// dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te// chos de rnams la mthar thug rnyed mi 'gyur// stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig nas su// rdul gyi
361a6(mdo sde): tshogs rnams bgrang bar nus na yang / / mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med pa// rgyun mi chad par de stong bgrang mi nus// sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi// phyi nang rgyu
361a7(mdo sde): ba'i dbugs ni bgrang nus kyang / / ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa// mdo sde de dag mthar thug nus mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// 'gro ba der yang sems
361b1(mdo sde): can gang skyed pa/ / de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid// rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus// rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang // klung dang mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag/
361b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang // de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po na// chu yi phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa// brgya tshal skra yi rtse
361b3(mdo sde): mos bgrang nus kyang / / de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi bgrang // gang mngon 'dir ni sems can ci byung ba// rang gi lus la snying por 'dogs pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba mang pos
361b4(mdo sde): bgrang nus kyang / / de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus// phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa// srog chags kun gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang // de dag rtag tu mi chad ston pa yi//
361b5(mdo sde): mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yong mi nus// chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing // nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa'i tshig don mkhas// gtan la bab pa'i yang dag tshul la
361b6(mdo sde): bslabs/ / blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can// yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo// bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag du shes// dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams
361b7(mdo sde): cad rig/ sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags mi 'gyur// thogs med de ni chos smrar brjod pa ste// 'gro ba kun la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur// dri ba nges par bstan pa rgyal mkhas// de ltar
362a1(mdo sde): de yis don dam rab tu rtogs/ / mdo sde gcig gi phyogs kyang bye ma snyed// bsam gyis mi khyab nges ston chags pa med// chags med ston pa tshig gi don la mkhas/
362a2(mdo sde): 'khor gyis nang du de 'chad chags mi 'gyur// ting badzin 'di la legs par gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo ba med// chos la stobs skyed bye brag thob pas ni//
362a3(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba mang po'i don de byed// ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te// rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa// de bzhin dge slong chos smra mkhas pa yang // pha rol rgol
362a4(mdo sde): pa kun gyis bskyed mi nus/ / stong chen gyis ni 'jig rten khams 'di ni// mi gang mi g.yo bar ni brjod pa rnams// de dag rlung gi rab tu bskyod nus kyang // su drag stong pa nyid la rtag
362a5(mdo sde): brtson pa/ / sangs rgyas gnas su nges pa de yin te// gtan la bab pa stong pa'i chos rab shes// de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus// phas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing //
362a6(mdo sde): smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi gnon// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas pa// zil gyis mnon smad pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bshad byas na// de yis stong
362a7(mdo sde): nyid rtogs par khong du chud/ / de ni chos rnams kun la nem nur med// ye shes mtha' yas dag la 'khor mor gnas// ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing bklags pa na// stobs
362b1(mdo sde): dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dka'/ / yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de la mngon par shes pa rnyed myi dka'// mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang /
362b2(mdo sde): srid par grub pa dag ni rnyed mi dka'// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// ting 'dzin 'di 'chang de yis mthong bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// ting
362b3(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te/ / yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag/ lha rdzas
362b4(mdo sde): nor bu rin chen bzang mchog gis/ / 'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// nor bu rin chen dag gis gang gyur dang // zhing yang mtha' yas rnams mang ji snyed pa// 'dzam bu'i
362b5(mdo sde): chu bo'i gser bkram gang ba kun/ / sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la sbyin pa byin// sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa// bskal pa mtha'
362b6(mdo sde): las mang por sbyin pa byin/ / sangs rgyas rnams la 'khor mor mi chad byin// byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sbyin tshogs la// dge slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' zhing // stobs
362b7(mdo sde): bcu la ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na/ / byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la// sbyin pa'i phung po lnga mas char mi phod// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rnyed nas// sangs
363a1(mdo sde): rgyus byung chub mtshungs med tshol ba'i phyir/ / dang ba rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin byin pa// de yi dper 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan// su dag ting 'dzin dam paca/
363a2(mdo sde): mchog 'di las// tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang // de yi bsod nams phung po bsags pa la// sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi phod// ting 'dzin rdul
363a3(mdo sde): bral zhi ba ma thos par/ / phan byed byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin byin kyang // thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob ltar// de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi thob// gang gi
363a4(mdo sde): zhi mchog sa 'di thob nas su/ / rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rig 'dzin no// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' dga' rtogs byed pa// des ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob// gang gis
363a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa/ / zhing rnams mthab ya sa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// nor bu rin po che yi gang bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ting
363a6(mdo sde): badzin 'di 'thob ste/ / rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa// thul bar dga' zhing mdzod rnams shin tu mang // nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan// ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral
363a7(mdo sde): bdi thob nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs pa ltar// rgyal srid shin tu 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang // mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur// de dang de dag sangs
363b1(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul mchog rnga cher 'dzin par 'gyur/ /
363b2(mdo sde): rgyas kun mkhyen gyi// chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par byed pa yin// zad pa'i mthar thug dus su gyur pa'i tshe// chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen po yang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod
363b3(mdo sde): kyang 'chang ba yin/ / de dang de dag sems can byed stong dang // khrag khrig chos kyi dbyings kyi mgu bar byed// de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can// skyes bu de dag bslab pa'i nor
363b4(mdo sde): gyi phyug/ de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs gnas// mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i mi gu yi// de dag chos gos ngur smrig rin chen 'chang // khyim nas 'byung la rtag du dga'
363b5(mdo sde): bar byed/ / de dag sems can phan phyin mnyam pa med// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// de dag dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang
363b6(mdo sde): rjes su ldan/ / de dag dul zhing rab tul rjes su song // zhi ba dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin// de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid logs pa// rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed//
363b7(mdo sde): sems can dag ni sad par byas nas su// rin chen chos bzang mchog la 'god par byed// de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin// khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang ba ste// mkha
363b8(mdo sde): pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed/ / gtong ba chen po dag la rtag tu dga'// de dag sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams// mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tshim
364a1(mdo sde): par byed/ / de dag sems can bde zhing phan pa'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs// de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste/
364a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnga yang rgya cher shin tu brdung // skye bo kun gyi the tsom 'khri zhing gcod// rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs// de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba// 'khor
364a3(mdo sde): gyi nang du stan la 'dug nas su/ / mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag ni// mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu ston// de dang de dag mang du thos pa yin// thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams
364a4(mdo sde): 'dzin/ / chos kyi mdzod rnams shin tu 'dzin byed de// thub pa'i chos kyi gter la dga' ba yin// da dang de dag shes rab yangs pa yin// dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed// zag
364a5(mdo sde): cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta dka' ba/ / zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams kyang rab tu ston// de dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste// des shing blo gros ldan pa chos la gnas// chos kyi rgyal srid/
364a6(mdo sde): rab tu ston byed cing // mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la rtag tu spyod// de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed de// bla ma la yang ri mo byed par gnas// chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas pa
364a7(mdo sde): ste/ blo gros rgyas pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams// rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong // rab tu ma rungs logs pa'i lam
364b1(mdo sde): song zhing / / 'khor ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni// de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed// dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang rab gnas te// de dag la ni yan lag
364b2(mdo sde): brgyad ldan pa/ / lam mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston// de dang de dag legs byas chos kyi gru// bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun du song ba dag/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing
364b3(mdo sde): khyer ba yi/ / sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed// byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po yis// go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas// pha rol 'gram bde rtag
364b4(mdo sde): tu 'jigs med par/ / khor mor sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed// de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la// shin tu spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog/ rig pa ye shes rnam
364b5(mdo sde): grol pha rol phyin/ / dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi yang sbyin par byed// nad ni rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi// sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su// de dag la ni chos kyi bkru sman gtong //
364b6(mdo sde): chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso bar byed// de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'jom// 'jig rten dbang po tshig gi dbang phyug ldan// shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang // ye
364b7(mdo sde): shes dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas/ / dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs 'jom pa// ye shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/
365a1(mdo sde): chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar byed// de dang de dag bdag po ded dpon te// gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa// sems can rin chen lam/
365a2(mdo sde): la rmongs gyur cing // rtag tu bdud kyi snying zhugs mthong nas ni// de dag la yang lam mchog zha zhing bde// rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston// mkhas pa dag ni ye shes lam
365a3(mdo sde): de yis/ / sems can mang po bye brgya 'dren par byed// de dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur// skyabs dang mig dang sgron ma byed pa yin// 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin// /
365a4(mdo sde): skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed// de dag sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang // dmus long gyur pa 'di dag rig nas ni// yang dag tshul bslabs rin chen chos
365a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ / chos kyis snang ba dag kyang byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten na ni bzo mchog ci yod pa// bzo bo byed pas sems can phan 'gyur zhing // gang gis sems can rtag tu
365a6(mdo sde): bder 'gyur ba/ / bzo yi rnam pa de dag shin tu bslabs// su dag byang chub tu ni mngon zhugs te// blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa// bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol
365a7(mdo sde): phyin/ / mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar thob// sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis// mtshungs pa med par ngoms par yong mi 'gyur// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin
365b1(mdo sde): pha rol phyin/ / zab mo yi ni chos rnams shin tu thos// de dag zhi ba rin chen chos rnams ni// gzhan la ston pas ngoms par mi 'gyur te// thar pa'i thabs kyi char yang rab 'babs
365b2(mdo sde): shing / chos kyi skyes bu dag ni tshim par byed// de yi drung du sems can mang po ni// chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su// chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po che
365b3(mdo sde): drangs zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyan pa/ / de dag blo gros 'chang pas the tsom bcad// chos kyis de dag shin tu mgu bar byed// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pa
365b4(mdo sde): rol phyin/ / sems can rnams kyis bsam pa rab tu shes// ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi// pha rol phyin pa sems can bsam la mkhas// sems can pha rol sems
365b5(mdo sde): dang spyod pa dang / / gang dag gtam ni ci 'dra'i chos brjod pa// ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang dag gis// sems can khrag khrig chos mchog mig thob 'gyur// de dag ye shes bye brag
365b6(mdo sde): pha rol phyin/ / lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par byed// mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang // bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yong mi shes// ji ltar nam mkha' la ni bya song ba// de yi
365b7(mdo sde): rjes ni gang du'ang shes mi nus/ / ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi// zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes dag lag gnas// dpa' bo khyung mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom// byang chub
366a1(mdo sde): zhi ba mngon par 'tshang yang rgyu/ / rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gis pha rol phyin// zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig
366a2(mdo sde): mthong / / ji bzhin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te// phyogs bcu dag gis gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur// ji snyed phyogs bcu yi ni srid pa na//
366a3(mdo sde): sems can yod dgu de dag 'dren par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang por ni// de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing // spobs pa yis ni rab tu bshad mdzad kyang // sngon gyi/
366a4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi nus// ting 'dzin mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di// skyes bu su gang 'dzin par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas dag gis nor rnams mi zad de// shin du rgya che yi/
366a5(mdo sde): shes rgya mtsho bzhin// tshul khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la
366a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ / gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por mtsha dang rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa
366a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i
366b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha don du bya/ nyon mongs pa med/
366b2(mdo sde): par sgom pas bsgoms par bya// gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ des bzod pa'i stobs bsgom par bya/ bzod pa bsten par bya/ mang du bya/ chos la don tu gnyer ba dang /
366b3(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o// sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o// des gnas gsum
366b4(mdo sde): la brtson par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa zad pa dang bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
366b5(mdo sde): bskyed par bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba rig par 'dod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ gnas gsum po de dag la mngon par brtson par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
366b6(mdo sde): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di dag tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to// bskal pa
366b7(mdo sde): stong du ji ltar ngas spyad pa/ / gzhon nur gyur pa nga las mnyam par gyis// ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa 'di chol phyir// sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod// de ltar
367a1(mdo sde): bskal pa 'das pa bsam yas su/ / zhing brgya yi ni bye ma ci yod pa// dper bstan de snyed 'das par gyur pa na// chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyab po byung /
367a2(mdo sde): ba stong phrag drug cu mi nyung ba// rgyal ba de yi tshogs ni byung gyur te// thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad// rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa// de yi dus na/
367a3(mdo sde): sa 'di thams cad kyang // bde zhing lo legs 'khrugs pa med par 'gyur// mi rnams thams cad skyid cing bde dang ldan// mi yi bde ba dag gis brgyas par gyur// thams
367a4(mdo sde): cad bsod nams stobs dang ldan pa ste/ / blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad phyug cing nor mang 'byor pa ste// lus ni lha yi bde dang ldan par gyur// des shing
367a5(mdo sde): brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs chung / / bzod pa'i stobs la dpa' zhing byad gzugs bzang // lha yi gnas na lha yi sras po bzhin// tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing blo gros
367a6(mdo sde): ldan/ / de yi dus na sa bdag byung ba ni// rgyal po me tog mchog ces bya ba yin// de yi bu yang lnga brgyar tshang ba byung // dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur// rgyal
367a7(mdo sde): po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal ba yi/ / skyed mos tshal brgya stong phrag drug cu dag/ thams cad me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa yang // thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phul// skyed
367b1(mdo sde): mos tshal ni brgya stong sna tshogs dag/ 'chags mal stan bzhugs gnas stong rnams dang // chos gos kyang ni bye ba brgya stong gis// 'chags bzhugs gnas rnams su 'ding ba byas//
367b2(mdo sde): de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang // dge sbyong dag gi longs spyod ci snyed pa// rgyal po'i bu ni shin tu yid dang bas// bder gshegs de la thams cad nye bar phul// rgyal po de yang dge
367b3(mdo sde): ba'i las bcu yi/ / lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nas su// skye bo srog chags khrag khrig brgya stong gis// mdun du bdar te 'dren pa lta bar song // me tog dag dang byug pa bdug
367b4(mdo sde): pa dang / / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sil snyan thogs nas su// rgyal ba de la de yis mchod byas te// thal mo sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur// lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang //
367b5(mdo sde): dge slong stong yang de tshe dga' bar gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa 'di ni lung ston tam// mi yi dbang po legs par chos gsung ngam// rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang // bla med sems
367b6(mdo sde): kyang rab byung mkhyen nas ni/ / mos pa'i gnas la pha rol phyin pa yis// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do// gang tshe bde bar gshegs pas gsung phyung ba// de tshe nags tshal bcas pa'i
367b7(mdo sde): sa yang g.yos/ / nam mkha' las ni me tog char yang bab// sa las pad+ma brgya dag byung bar gyur// ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs pas// bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dren pas lung
368a1(mdo sde): bstan te/ / mi yi dbang pos ting 'dzin zhi ba bshad// de yi don tshig rnams kyang mnyan par gyis// srid pa thams cad srid pa med pa ste// kun brtags gsog/
368a2(mdo sde): dang smig rgyu 'dra ba yin// sgyu ma ji bzhin grogs dang sprin 'dra ste// stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med// gabod ma nas ni stong zhing ma po ngas chos// song ba med cing
368a3(mdo sde): gnas med gnas kyis dben/ / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po med// thams cad dag cing rnam dag nam mkha' bzhin// mi sngo mi ser dkar po ma yin te// ming ni gsog gyur
368a4(mdo sde): sgra yi rang bzhin yin/ / sems ni dben zhing sems med rang bzhin te// skad cig yin pas thams cad sgra dang bral// bshad pa na yang yi ge 'pho ba med// ma bshad na yang
368a5(mdo sde): yi ge 'drer mi 'gyur/ / yi ge dag ni phyogs su'ang mi 'gro ste// yi ge gang nas kyang ni 'ongs ma yin// yi ge mi zad zad cing 'gags pa ste// bshad par byas bsam bshad par
368a6(mdo sde): ma byas kyang / / yi ge 'di dag rtag par mi zad brjod// gang gis yongs shes de'ang zad mi 'gyur// chos ni stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas// sangs rgyas brgya stong dang ni//
368a7(mdo sde): gang 'das pa// chos kyang ma zad yi ge zad ma gyur// skye ba'ang med de de phyir mi zad pa// gang gis mi zad chos rnams rab shes pa// rtag tu mi zad pa yi chos shes
368b1(mdo sde): pas/ mdo sde brgya stong dag ni bshad byas kyang // chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes// rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa// de yang mi zad pas na mi mthong ste/
368b2(mdo sde): chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med// de dag rab tu ston kyang zad mi 'gyur// mkhas pa de ni tshig kun smra byed kyang // tshig gis sems ni 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te// tshig
368b3(mdo sde): rnams thams cad ri yi brag cha bzhin/ / de phyir nam yang tshig la chags mi 'gyur// de ni sgyu ma'i tshig gis chos ston to// tshig de thams cad de yi mod la 'gags// cho ga de yi ni
368b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ / chos rnams kun kyang mtshan nyid de 'drar gyur// chos kun mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan gzhi bral// thams cad mtshan med mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ rtag tu dben
368b5(mdo sde): zhing gtsang ba nam mkha' bzhin/ / mdor na de dag bgrang bar nyer mi 'gyur// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kun dben pa ste// drang srong de dag la ni rnam rtog med// 'gro ba kun tu 'dus
368b6(mdo sde): ma byas thob pas/ / lta ba dgra las khor mor rnam par dben// gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa ni// rtag tu ma chags mi gtum ma rmongs te// de yis sems ni rang bzhin//
368b7(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag/ de ni ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan// brag phug ri dang gcong rong krung rnams su// rkyen gyis ji ltar brag cha 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin 'dus byas
369a1(mdo sde): 'di kun rig par gyis/ / 'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin// gang du ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa// yon tan chos su gyur pa shes rab stobs/
369a2(mdo sde): drang srong ye shes stobs kyis mngon par shes// tshig ni thabs mkhas pa yi nges pa'i tshig/ brtags pa tsam du brtags nas brjod pa yin// 'khor ba na ni mtha' ma mi rnyed de/
